WRITING.TITLE: Feel like Overwatch needs a token pyro character
WRITING.TEXT:
Could be another junker, or something? Shift would throw a molotov, has a flamethrower, secondary could be like, spray napalm on the targeted surface (a la Mei's snowblower thing), lasts for 20 seconds, then you would be able to ignite the trail. E could spray napalm in a decent sized AOE around you.
This would allow you to be a brawler type hero, he'd need a decent sized health pool, or some kind of damage mitigation mechanic. Maybe 300 health, and takes 50% reduced damage from AOE attacks, 40% reduced damage from direct attacks, and 150% damage from headshots?
